OOC: Okay well that's great and all that your firing on Megs, but he is
a few miles away from the CF, and behind a hill. Motormaster is alos
already on the ground, so you are aiming for his head.

BIC
Motormaster sees the slow amount of energy buildup again, and puts both
arms to the ground and uses his tremendous strength to push himself
several feet off of the ground, and starts to fly away, the explosion
nipping at his heels. 

Wildrider got hit twice (because he wasnt looking people) and fell over
on his side, his shoulder and sied smoking. He looked at Shockwave,
worried.
